column4: Hey, I'm accessing a remote machine via gnome and ssh://ip ... however, I cannot make any changes to files owned by root... is there a way to raise my privileges? or do I have to log in via a terminal to do that?
and I only have one user and no root user activated.
well, I guess, I have to use the terminal then
well, why do you want to make changes that require root in the first place?
